name: ChainDive
description:
Sony Computer Entertainment and developed by Alvion Co., Ltd. (Alvion's third game title). A chain action game that captures 3D space on two axes, flutters in the air in all directions, and destroys the approaching insect-type creatures. When TGS was announced, it was a battle royale game with a show business as a world view, but when it was released, it became a science fiction fantasy world view that fights against the evil of the galaxy.

Different stages are prepared for each stage, and you can enjoy the part of how to capture the stage. The scenario is ADV mode before and after play.
